document_data.name: Shremala
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shremala''' were one of the [[Bedine]] tribes that roamed across the desert of [[Anauroch]] during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: As with the case with other tribes of the Bedine, the Shremala were lead by a single male sheikh. As of the early 1360s the sheikh of the Shremala was the wise elder [[Yatagan]].
document_data.History: The Shremala were one of the Bedine tribes that join forces to fight back against [[Zhentarim]] influence in the {{YearlinkName|1360}}.
